title: USPS Delivery Address
description: A physical location served by a broadband provider.

zipcode.title: Zip Code
zipcode.description: A five-digit code assigned by the USPS to a section of a street, a collection streets an establishment, structure, or group of post office boxes, for the delivery of mail.

zipcodePlus4.title: Zip Code Plus 4
zipcodePlus4.description: The extended ZIP code format includes the five-digit ZIP code followed by a hyphen and four additional digits. This extended format is used to provide more precise location information.
